value.title: Top 5 stories of the week: ML meets Google Sheets, AWS eyes trends, dangers of ChatGPT and more

value.title: Exafunction supports AWS Inferentia to unlock best price performance for machine learning inference
value.excerpt: Across all industries, machine learning (ML) models are getting deeper, workflows are getting more complex, and workloads are operating at larger scales.
